me.lihq.game.models

Class Clue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • me.lihq.game.models.Clue

  • public class Clue
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
    Defines the clues that the player needs to find in order to solve the murder.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Clue

        public Clue(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String description,
            boolean weapon,
            int clueX,
            int clueY)
        Creates a clue
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the clue i.e. what it is
        description - Describes what the clue is
        weapon - Whether this clue is the murder weapon or not
        clueX - The column of the texture on the spritesheet
        clueY - The row of the texture on the spritesheet

        This constructor builds a clue from another clue

        public Clue setTileCoordinates(Vector2Int v)
        Sets the tile coordinates of the clue in the map.
        Parameters:
        v - The Vector2Int that the clue's tile coordinates are to be set to

        All coordinates relative to the bottom left of the map

        Returns:
        (Clue) This object once the location has been updated

      • setTileCoordinates

        public Clue setTileCoordinates(int x,
                               int y)
        Sets the tile coordinates of the clue in the map.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate for where the clue is, in terms of tiles.
        y - The y coordinate for where the clue is, in terms of tiles.

        All coordinates relative to the bottom left of the map

        Returns:
        (Clue) this object
